resources.string: ORA
Start the reading of your Opus or Occasional card

ARTM (Autorité régionale de transport métropolitain), exo, Opus, REM (Réseau express métropolitain), RTC (Réseau de transport de la Capitale), RTL (Réseau de transport de Longueuil), STM (Société de transport de Montréal), STL (Société de transport de Laval) et STLévis (Société de transport de Lévis) are registered trademarks. This application is not affiliated with, endorsed or sponsored by these entities.
NFC Feature Unavailable
This device does not appear to support NFC (Near Field Communication), which is required for the app to function properly.
NFC Feature Disabled
The NFC (Near Field Communication) feature must be enabled to use the app correctly.
Notifications Disabled
Notification permission is required to receive alerts before the transit fares expire.
Alarms and Reminders Disabled
Permission to use the device\'s alarms and reminders is needed to receive precise alerts about fares validity.

OPUS CARD
OCCASIONAL CARD
Identifier
Expiration Date
None
Date of Birth
Unknown
Registered
Information about registration

Since this OPUS card is registered, it offers a guarantee in case of loss or theft. It can be replaced and the tickets stored on it can be recovered. \n\nThis guarantee does not apply to an OPUS card that has expired for more than six months.
Expired
Information about expiration

This OPUS card is no longer usable since it has passed its expiration date. The card will no longer work even if you still have valid tickets loaded on it. \n\nA new card is required to purchase of new transit fares (issuance fees apply). The restitution of unexpired transit fares is possible on the new card.
Information about this type of card
Standard
All modes AB
TAll modes ABC
All modes ABCD
Bus out of territory

On ARTM territory, this Opus can contain the following fares:

 • All monthly fares
 • All modes A: 1, 2, or 10 tickets, 24hrs, 3 days, Weekly
 • Bus: 1, 2, or 10 trips, 24hrs, 3 days
 • Unlimited evening
 • Unlimited weekend

On ARTM territory, this Opus can contain the following fares:

 • All monthly fares
 • All modes AB: 1, 2, or 10 tickets, 24hrs, 3 days
 • Unlimited evening
 • Unlimited weekend

On ARTM territory, this Opus can contain the following fares:

 • All monthly fares
 • All modes ABC: 1, 2, or 10 tickets, 24hrs, 3 days
 • Unlimited evening
 • Unlimited weekend

On ARTM territory, this Opus can contain the following fares:

 • All monthly fares
 • All modes ABCD: 1, 2, or 10 tickets, 24hrs, 3 days
 • Unlimited evening
 • Unlimited weekend

On ARTM territory, this Opus can contain the following fares:

 • All monthly fares
 • Bus out of territory: 1, 2, or 10 trips, 24hrs, 3 days
 • Unlimited evening
 • Unlimited weekend

Information about the fare
This fare is currently unknown by the application.
This fare can still be used, but it is not possible to bought it anymore. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
Unknown description for this fare.

This fare is valid for the whole month. This pass is offered to seniors (65 years and older). It is accepted on all exo bus lines of the Laurentides sector. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It can be used on weekdays after 6 PM, as well as at any time on weekends and holidays; can also be used from December 24th to January 2nd and during the CSSMI spring break. It allows you to use all exo bus lines in the Laurentides sector. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid from July 1st until August 31st. It is accepted on all exo bus lines of the Laurentides sector. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on all exo bus lines of the Le Richelain-Roussillon sector to/from Brossard. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on all exo bus lines of the La Pesqu\'Île sector. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on all exo bus lines of the La Pesqu\'Île sector. \n\nOnce used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes.

This fare consists of ten distinct tickets. Each ticket is accepted on all exo bus lines of the La Pesqu\'Île sector. \n\nOnce used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on all exo bus lines in Léry, Châteauguay and Kahnawake. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on all exo bus lines of the Sud-Ouest sector to/from Angrignon station. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid for a whole year. It is accepted on all exo bus lines of the Vallée-du-Richelieu sector. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on all exo local bus lines of the L\'Assomption sector (including L\'Épiphanie). \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This pass is offered free of charge to seniors (65 years and older) who are residents of the MRC L\'Assomption. It is accepted on all exo local bus lines of the L\'Assomption sector (including L\'Épiphanie). \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on all exo local bus lines of the Terrebonne-Mascouche sector. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on all exo local bus lines of the Terrebonne-Mascouche sector. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on all exo bus lines of the Terrebonne-Mascouche sector. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid from June 23rd until August 31st. It is accepted on all exo bus lines of the Terrebonne-Mascouche sector. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare consists of six distinct tickets. Each ticket is accepted on all exo local bus lines of the Terrebonne-Mascouche sector. \n\nOnce a ticket is used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes.
This fare is valid from June 1st to August 20th. It is accepted on all exo bus lines of the Sainte-Julie sector. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is offered free of charge to seniors (65 years and older) in the following cities: Boucherville, Brossard, Longueuil and Saint-Lambert. It is accepted on all bus lines of the RTL (Réseau de transport de Longueuil) outside peak periods, i.e. from 9 AM to 3:30 PM and from 6:30 PM on weekdays, as well as all weekends and public holidays. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on all bus lines of the STL (Société de Transport de Laval). 

It is reserved for students of Laval Junior Academy and Laval Senior Academy schools. It is available for all months of the current school year (September 1st to June 30th). 

This fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid from July 1st until August 31st. It is accepted on all bus lines of the STL (Société de Transport de Laval). \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the buses of the STL (Société de Transport de Laval). 

It is provided for free with the Quality Commitment program of the agency. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes.

This fare consists of a multiple tickets. Each ticket is accepted on the buses of the STL (Société de Transport de Laval). 

They are provided for free with the Quality Commitment program of the agency. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes.

This fare is offered free of charge to seniors (65 years and older) of Laval. It is accepted on all bus lines of the STL (Société de Transport de Laval). \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on all bus lines of the RTL (Réseau de transport de Longueuil) as well as the Rive-Sud branch of the REM. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare consists of ten distinct tickets. Each ticket is accepted on all bus lines of the RTL (Réseau de transport de Longueuil) as well as the Rive-Sud branch of the REM. \n\nOnce a ticket is used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the REM can only be passed once per ticket.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on all bus lines in the Chambly-Richelieu-Carignan, Sainte-Julie and Vallée-du-Richelieu sectors (except for routes passing through the municipalities of Marieville, Saint-Hyacinthe, Sainte-Madeleine and Sainte-Marie-Madeleine), as well as the Rive-Sud branch of the REM. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It allows you to use all the bus lines in the Chambly-Richelieu-Carignan sector as well as the Rive-Sud branch of the REM. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It allows you to use all the bus lines in the Le Richelain-Roussillon sector as well as the Rive-Sud branch of the REM. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It allows you to use all the bus lines in the Vallée-du-Richelieu sector as well as the Rive-Sud branch of the REM. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones 1 to 4 (old fare zones). It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare offers a discount on the standard price because of the instability of the REM service. This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones 1 to 4 (old fare zones). It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones 1 to 6 (old fare zones). It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the train in zones 1 to 3 (old fare zones). \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the train in zones 1 to 4 (old fare zones). \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the train in zones 1 to 5 (old fare zones). \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the train in zones 1 to 3 (old fare zones) and the metro because of construction at Lucien L\'Allier station. It is not possible to buy it anymore as construction work is finished. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the train in zones 1 to 4 (old fare zones) and the metro because of construction at Lucien L\'Allier station. It is not possible to buy it anymore as construction work is finished. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the train in zones 1 to 5 (old fare zones) and the metro because of construction at Lucien L\'Allier station. It is not possible to buy it anymore as construction work is finished. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare consists of six distinct tickets. Each ticket is accepted on the train in zones 1 to 4 (old fare zones). \n\nThe round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside 120 minutes.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the buses running in zones A, B and C. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the buses running in zones B, C and D. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zone A. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in this zone. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare offers a discount on the standard price because of the instability of the REM service. This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zone A. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in this zone. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones A and B. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare offers a discount on the standard price because of the instability of the REM service. This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones A and B. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones A, B and C. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare offers a discount on the standard price because of the instability of the REM service. This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones A, B and C. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones A, B, C and D. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare offers a discount on the standard price because of the instability of the REM service. This fare is valid for the whole month. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones A, B, C and D. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in these zones. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for four consecutive months. It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zone A. It is also accepted in the river shuttles running in this zone. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the buses running in zones A, B and C. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. 

This ticket is not valid on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.
This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the buses running in zones B, C and D. \n\nOnce used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes.

This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zone A. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

This ticket is not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare consists of a single ticket. This ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones A and B. 

Once used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

This ticket is not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

Once a ticket is used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. 

These tickets are not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

These tickets are not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare is provided for free as an attenuation measure during l'Île aux Tourtes bridge construction. It consists of two distinct tickets that have to be used before May 31st, 2024. Each ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones A, B, C and D. 

Once a ticket is used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

These tickets are not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare offers a discount of 25% on the standard price as an attenuation measure during l'Île aux Tourtes bridge construction. It consists of ten distinct tickets. Each ticket is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones A, B and C. 

Once a ticket is used, the transfer is possible with different bus routes during 120 minutes. The gates or turnstiles from the metro or the REM can only be passed once per ticket. The round trip is allowed by train if it stays inside the two hours. 

These tickets are not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.
This fare is valid for 24 hours (starting after the first use). It is accepted on the buses running in zones A, B and C. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.
This fare is valid for 24 hours (starting after the first use). It is accepted on the buses running in zones B, C and D. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for seven days in a row (from Monday until 11:59 PM on Sunday). It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in the zone A. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare is valid for all the evening (from 6 PM until the next day at 5 AM). It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones A, B, C and D. 

This fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints. 

This fare is not accepted on bus route '747 - YUL Aéroport Montréal-Trudeau / Centre-ville' from the STM.

This fare is valid for all the weekend (from Friday at 4 PM until Monday at 5 AM). It is accepted on the metro, the bus, the train and the REM in zones A, B, C and D. \n\nThis fare is unlimited. There are no transfer constraints.

This fare consists of six distinct tickets. Each ticket is accepted on bus route \'125 - Saint-Donat / Chertsey / Montréal\' from the MRC Joliette. \n\nIt can be used for a trip between Saint-Donat and Montréal (or the other way around) on this route.
